synopsis.text: Shinya Yukimura and Ayame Himuro, two brilliant scientists at Saitama University, find themselves grappling with an enigma that transcends the realm of their laboratories: love. Ayame, bold and captivating, confesses her feelings for the logical and level-headed Shinya, leaving him in a state of bemusement. Unable to comprehend the complexities of love, the two scientists embark on a quest to quantify their romantic feelings, turning their lab into a playground for experiments aimed at deciphering the science behind love. With the help of their friends, they strive to identify the characteristics that define love and determine if their feelings for each other align with these traits. Will they succeed in applying scientific theory to validate their love, or will love remain an unsolvable mystery? Join these quirky scientists as they navigate the intricate labyrinth of love in this delightful romantic comedy.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
